programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. programme.title: Courts of Heaven
programme.desc: Author and speaker Robert Henderson seeks to discipline the nations, bring people to their destiny, and shares the truth about how to take hold of the victory available through Jesus Christ.

programme.title: God TV
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest content from God TV.

programme.title: Psalms 23 -- Ward Simpson
programme.desc: Network President Ward Simpson delivers a message expanding and expounding on Psalm 23.

programme.title: God TV
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest content from God TV.

programme.title: CBN Christian World News
programme.desc: Brings a Biblical perspective to news headlines and stories that are of importance to the global Christian community. Produced by the Christian Broadcasting Network.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E1 Bat Masterson Leaves the West After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E2 Home Ranch After Lucas buys his ranch, hired hands of a wealthy cattleman demand he leave. When Lucas refuses, the men beat him, drag him, and then they burn his ranch house to the ground. Lucas tracks these men down and confronts their boss, Oat Jackford.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger crosses paths with a frontier family traveling to the Wyoming Territory. He becomes the family's defender against a ruthless gang bent on taking all they have and robbing them of their dreams, lives, and futures.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E4 Blood Moon A cholera outbreak spreads fear among the townspeople of Sweetwater. They blame a defenseless, mentally disabled boy named Danny, who traveled to town with a medicine show. Now, the riders must protect him from an angry mob of citizens.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E12 Judgement Day Still feeling the effects of Hezekiah Horn's death, Cody seeks guidance from a self-proclaimed preacher named Gideon Poole. Cody discovers that Poole is a bounty hunter and that he is after Teaspoon for dropped charges from 16 years ago.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E14 The Peacemakers Jimmy falls for Alice, who is a member of a religious group called The Peacemakers. Jimmy defends the members who want to settle and build a church. However, the hostile townspeople are against their plans to use the land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E21 The Indian U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart escorts an Indian prisoner back east to stand trial. They arrive in North Fork and Lucas finds out that Buckhart is also an Indian who was educated at Harvard. Angry townspeople try to take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E22 The Boarding House Julia Andueza opens a boarding house in North Fork. Lucas remembers her as a dishonest card dealer from the past. Her old boss arrives and tries to bully Julia into turning her business into a gambling house. Lucas realizes she has changed her ways.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E15 The Princess Lucas and Mark find a young woman named Jennifer and her ill brother, Charles, hiding in their barn. Doc Burrage treats the boy for measles and they take refuge at the McCain Ranch, but soon Lucas learns that she may be a runaway princess from Europe.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E16 Gunfire Infamous outlaw Charlie Gordo is in the North Fork Jail waiting for the U.S. Marshal to take him to Yuma for hanging. Micah learns that the lawman is dead, and Gordo's gang is arriving soon. Micah, Lucas, and others defend the jail from the gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E17 The Quiet Fear Jake Striker buys Brice Hornsby's farm after moving to North Fork. Townspeople befriend Jake's pretty daughter, Abbey, who is deaf and cannot speak. Problems arise when a trail bum attacks her and blames the hired hand. Lucas must find the truth.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E18 Sporting Chance Englishman Jeremy Pennebroke arrives in North Fork and announces he has come to kill Lucas McCain with his custom-made rifle. He believes if he guns Lucas down, he will earn respect and a reputation. Ironically, Lucas later defends Pennebroke.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E6 Town of Fear Cheyenne delivers a bank robber to his friend Sheriff Sam Townley. Soon afterward, the townspeople accuse Townley of accidentally shooting a popular farmer's son and they turn against Cheyenne when he tries to prove the sheriff's innocence.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E7 Hired Gun Cheyenne rides into a new town looking for work. He meets a hired gunman named Preacher in a saloon. When the town sheriff shoots and kills Preacher, Cheyenne investigates to find out why he was there in the first place.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E12 Judgement Day Still feeling the effects of Hezekiah Horn's death, Cody seeks guidance from a self-proclaimed preacher named Gideon Poole. Cody discovers that Poole is a bounty hunter and that he is after Teaspoon for dropped charges from 16 years ago.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E6 Town of Fear Cheyenne delivers a bank robber to his friend Sheriff Sam Townley. Soon afterward, the townspeople accuse Townley of accidentally shooting a popular farmer's son and they turn against Cheyenne when he tries to prove the sheriff's innocence.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E7 Hired Gun Cheyenne rides into a new town looking for work. He meets a hired gunman named Preacher in a saloon. When the town sheriff shoots and kills Preacher, Cheyenne investigates to find out why he was there in the first place.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E15 Daisy Rachel's hustler ex-boyfriend, Roger, comes back to Sweetwater with his daughter, Daisy. Daisy's mischief results in a fight between The Kid and Jimmy. Meanwhile, Lou and The Kid break up because she is not ready for marriage.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E17 Old Scores Convinced that he has seen one of the men responsible for the murder of his family, Ike seeks revenge. However, the suspect is now a family man himself. Meanwhile, the riders investigate reports of a mysterious beast in the area.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E23 The Second Witness Lucas' life is in danger after he agrees to testify in a murder case in another town. The only other witness was killed, and when a gun-toting stranger appears at the McCain Ranch, Lucas now finds himself in grave danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E24 The Trade Outlaw Sam Morley, an old friend, comes to the McCain Ranch. He asks Lucas to turn in him for the $500 reward and use the money to pay for his girlfriend's medical care. However, a bounty hunter has other ideas.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E8 The Gold Rush Lawman When failed prospector John Hicks Adams is elected sheriff of Santa Clara County, he must prove that he won't be a bust as a lawman too. Just weeks into the job, his courage is tested when a band of stagecoach robbers begins terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E3 Pinkerton Detectives Track a Killer After a bank robbery, two Pinkerton detectives join forces to track the notorious Missouri Kid. During a shootout, the Missouri Kid kills seasoned detective Charles Schumacher, leaving young George Dougherty to finish the job and avenge his death.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E1 Joe Meek: A Fearless Fighter Already a seasoned mountain man, Joe Meek has a reputation for raw courage and bravery among the trappers of the west. But Meek becomes a frontier legend when he risks his life in a fearless charge to save the woman that he loves from Crow warriors.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E7 Bandits When a masked bandit terrorizes the stagecoach line, killing a passenger, Theodore Roosevelt and his Elkhorn men join the citizens of Medora to track down the culprit. Can they lay a trap to catch the killer before he strikes again?

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E19 A Young Man's Fancy A pretty young girl named Sally Walker arrives on stagecoach in North Fork to visit her aunt Milly. When Mark sees her beauty, he falls in love with Sally instantly. However, she has her eyes on a boy from her past, Bruce Henry, who owns a ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E20 The Man from Salinas Lucas is acting deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. When the North Fork Bank is robbed, Lucas shoots and critically wounds Rudy Gray. Problems arise when a man posing as Gray's brother arrives in town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E21 Two Ounces of Tin A gunman named Tip Corey, whose father was allegedly murdered in North Fork, rides into town and threatens to kill Marshal Micah Torrance. Corey gives Micah an ultimatum: take his badge off or he will end his life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E22 Deadly Image A local rancher, who claims to be an eyewitness, accuses Lucas of murder. Townspeople are shocked until Earl Bantry, who looks like Lucas' twin, arrives in North Fork. Bantry, a ruthless criminal, threatens Mark and goes on a rampage against Lucas.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E8 Top Hand Cheyenne turns down a job as top hand for a local rancher. Other ranchers who want his service soon confront him. Cheyenne discovers that he is now in the middle of a range war, which includes land and water rights.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Last Comanchero Cheyenne tracks down and captures the leader of the last Comancheros, Rafe Larkin. Once back in town, he soon discovers that the townspeople demand Rafe's lynching since he sold weapons to the Indians.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E15 Daisy Rachel's hustler ex-boyfriend, Roger, comes back to Sweetwater with his daughter, Daisy. Daisy's mischief results in a fight between The Kid and Jimmy. Meanwhile, Lou and The Kid break up because she is not ready for marriage.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Talisman After a priest contacts Teaspoon for help, he takes the riders on a mission to save a village of farmers being terrorized by ruthless bandits who want their silver. Meanwhile, Buck helps protect a woman from a man that has an infatuation with her.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Noble Chase Jimmy teams up with his rival, Jake Colter, to hunt down Lon Chase, a bank robber with a heart of gold that has a high price on his head. Chase ultimately convinces them that he had to do it in order to stop illegal activity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E8 The Many Faces of Charles Siringo Unable to apprehend the train-robbing Smith Brothers, Sheriff Doc Shores calls the Pinkerton Detective Agency for assistance. The agency sends Charles Siringo, an undercover specialist known for his unorthodox methods of capturing criminals.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E3 Bass Reeves Tracks Belle Starr As U.S. Marshal Bass Reeves attempts to arrest Belle Starr and her outlaw husband, Belle asks for 24 hours to find someone to care for her young daughter, Pearl. When the Starr family decides to flee instead, the Marshal must track them down.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E2 Jim Beckwourth: The Long Ride Jim Beckwourth lives a life of adventure as a trapper, trader and adopted member of the Crow tribe. When America goes to war, Beckwourth becomes an army dispatch rider, a job that puts him and a young greenhorn on a collision course with the Pawnee.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E6 Ten-Cent Hero A dime novelist takes revenge on Jimmy by creating a story in his latest novel, penning him as Wild Bill Hickok, "the fastest gun in the West." Soon afterward, a hired gunman arrives in Sweetwater to take him down in a gunfight.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E8 Crossroads After a wildfire rages through Elkhorn Ranch, Theodore Roosevelt is forced to sell some livestock before the fall roundup. But Roosevelt's pride prevents him from accepting a low offer from the town's founder, triggering a violent chain of events.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E23 The Debt While Marshal Micah Torrance is transporting a prisoner to his execution, he meets Lucas and Mark on the trail. When Mark reocognizes the convict is the same man who saved his life three years earlier, he disobeys his father and helps him escape.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E24 Tinhorn Mark and Milly are shocked that Lucas has taken up gambling. However, they don't know that a good friend is in danger of losing his farm to a professional gambler and has asked Lucas to help. Lucas goes undercover to get to the bottom of things.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E25 None So Blind Mark befriends Lafayette Blye, a blind banjo-playing man. Blye tells Mark he's hunting the man responsible for his blindness. Meanwhile, veterinarian John J. Mack tells Lucas he needs to destroy his herd. It turns out Mack is the man Blye is seeking.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E26 Jealous Man Micah's friends, Jake Owens, and his pretty wife, Fay, are Lucas' new neighbors. Jake is wildly jealous of Fay and wrongly imagines Lucas and Fay are having a romance. Jake soon threatens to kill Lucas, which almost leads to his own death instead.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Gamble Cheyenne helps an old friend by helping her keep her saloon from crooked gamblers. The woman's daughter who has been back east in school, will be arriving back in town soon, but she knows nothing about how her mother earned money for her education.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E11 Renegades Cheyenne fulfills a dying war hero's wish and helps his son enlist in the Army. Cheyenne arrives at Fort Sumner with Jed Wayne, but trouble soon arises from a demanding colonel and the Comanche Indians' imminent uprising.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Talisman After a priest contacts Teaspoon for help, he takes the riders on a mission to save a village of farmers being terrorized by ruthless bandits who want their silver. Meanwhile, Buck helps protect a woman from a man that has an infatuation with her.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Noble Chase Jimmy teams up with his rival, Jake Colter, to hunt down Lon Chase, a bank robber with a heart of gold that has a high price on his head. Chase ultimately convinces them that he had to do it in order to stop illegal activity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E8 The Many Faces of Charles Siringo Unable to apprehend the train-robbing Smith Brothers, Sheriff Doc Shores calls the Pinkerton Detective Agency for assistance. The agency sends Charles Siringo, an undercover specialist known for his unorthodox methods of capturing criminals.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E3 Bass Reeves Tracks Belle Starr As U.S. Marshal Bass Reeves attempts to arrest Belle Starr and her outlaw husband, Belle asks for 24 hours to find someone to care for her young daughter, Pearl. When the Starr family decides to flee instead, the Marshal must track them down.

programme.desc: S4 E25 None So Blind Mark befriends Lafayette Blye, a blind banjo-playing man. Blye tells Mark he's hunting the man responsible for his blindness. Meanwhile, veterinarian John J. Mack tells Lucas he needs to destroy his herd. It turns out Mack is the man Blye is seeking.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Gamble Cheyenne helps an old friend by helping her keep her saloon from crooked gamblers. The woman's daughter who has been back east in school, will be arriving back in town soon, but she knows nothing about how her mother earned money for her education.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E11 Renegades Cheyenne fulfills a dying war hero's wish and helps his son enlist in the Army. Cheyenne arrives at Fort Sumner with Jed Wayne, but trouble soon arises from a demanding colonel and the Comanche Indians' imminent uprising.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E20 Face of the Enemy Teaspoon's old friend, war hero Colonel Matthew Curtis, orders an attack on the Sioux delegation after they ambush his men. The townspeople are in danger when the Sioux threatens to retaliate. It turns out that another tribe is responsible.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E1 A House Divided After the destruction of a Pony Express station in Rock Creek, Teaspoon, The Kid, and Jimmy receive an assignment to rebuild it. They must relocate and learn the new territory near town as well as the neighbors in the area.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E27 The Wrong Man A crooked marshal comes to North Fork looking for a wanted man. He finds a man fitting the futitive's description. He deliberately kills the wrong man to collect the bounty and then blackmails the real outlaw, who wants to keep his past hidden.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E28 The Challenge An escaped killer wants to prove he hasn't lost his nerve when he holds up North Fork's General Store and takes Marshal Micah Torrance hostage. He provokes the town to try to face him, but only Lucas is strong enough to rise up to his challenge.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E2 Billy the Kid: Birth of an Outlaw Teenaged fugitive William Bonney is given a second chance when a kindhearted ranch owner offers him a job. But when his new employer is killed in cold blood, Bonney reverts to his criminal ways, seeking vengeance and transforming into Billy the Kid.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Discoveries of George McJunkin After a devastating storm, ranch foreman George McJunkin finds ancient bison fossils and flint points unearthed in a riverbank, and he sets out to find someone in the scientific community who will acknowledge the importance of his discovery.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E3 Jim Baker: A Born Leader Heading west as a young adventurer, greenhorn Jim Baker quickly develops a reputation as a skilled marksman and mountain man. When a party of trappers is surrounded and attacked by Cheyenne and Arapaho warriors, Baker proves that he is also a leader.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Roundup Theodore Roosevelt and his Elkhorn men strike out for the open range to participate in their first cattle roundup. But their excitement about gathering their herd is soon overshadowed by the realization that others are conspiring against them.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. programme.title: People Puzzler
programme.desc: Leah Remini hosts the show, which features three contestants who put their pop culture knowledge to the test to complete crosswords from the pop culture magazine. During a player's turn, one word out of 10 is chosen from the board. The contestant is then shown the first unrevealed letter in the word, and a clue is given, with correct answers scoring points based on the word. The player who wins the most points after three rounds moves forward to the fast puzzle bonus round, where they get the opportunity to win a cash prize.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: Steve Harvey assumes the hosting duties for this daytime game show in which five members of one family are pitted against five members of another family. Each team's goal is to guess the results of audience survey questions. A player from each team initially faces off, answering the question to earn the chance to either pass or play. The winning family gets a chance to earn extra cash in a bonus round.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Cash Cab

programme.title: People Puzzler
programme.desc: Leah Remini hosts the show, which features three contestants who put their pop culture knowledge to the test to complete crosswords from the pop culture magazine. During a player's turn, one word out of 10 is chosen from the board. The contestant is then shown the first unrevealed letter in the word, and a clue is given, with correct answers scoring points based on the word. The player who wins the most points after three rounds moves forward to the fast puzzle bonus round, where they get the opportunity to win a cash prize.

programme.title: Family Feud

The winning family gets a chance to earn extra cash in a bonus round.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E1 Bat Masterson Leaves the West After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E2 Home Ranch After Lucas buys his ranch, hired hands of a wealthy cattleman demand he leave. When Lucas refuses, the men beat him, drag him, and then they burn his ranch house to the ground. Lucas tracks these men down and confronts their boss, Oat Jackford.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger crosses paths with a frontier family traveling to the Wyoming Territory. He becomes the family's defender against a ruthless gang bent on taking all they have and robbing them of their dreams, lives, and futures.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E4 Blood Moon A cholera outbreak spreads fear among the townspeople of Sweetwater. They blame a defenseless, mentally disabled boy named Danny, who traveled to town with a medicine show. Now, the riders must protect him from an angry mob of citizens.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E12 Judgement Day Still feeling the effects of Hezekiah Horn's death, Cody seeks guidance from a self-proclaimed preacher named Gideon Poole. Cody discovers that Poole is a bounty hunter and that he is after Teaspoon for dropped charges from 16 years ago.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E14 The Peacemakers Jimmy falls for Alice, who is a member of a religious group called The Peacemakers. Jimmy defends the members who want to settle and build a church. However, the hostile townspeople are against their plans to use the land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E21 The Indian U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart escorts an Indian prisoner back east to stand trial. They arrive in North Fork and Lucas finds out that Buckhart is also an Indian who was educated at Harvard. Angry townspeople try to take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E22 The Boarding House Julia Andueza opens a boarding house in North Fork. Lucas remembers her as a dishonest card dealer from the past. Her old boss arrives and tries to bully Julia into turning her business into a gambling house. Lucas realizes she has changed her ways.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E15 The Princess Lucas and Mark find a young woman named Jennifer and her ill brother, Charles, hiding in their barn. Doc Burrage treats the boy for measles and they take refuge at the McCain Ranch, but soon Lucas learns that she may be a runaway princess from Europe.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E16 Gunfire Infamous outlaw Charlie Gordo is in the North Fork Jail waiting for the U.S. Marshal to take him to Yuma for hanging. Micah learns that the lawman is dead, and Gordo's gang is arriving soon. Micah, Lucas, and others defend the jail from the gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E17 The Quiet Fear Jake Striker buys Brice Hornsby's farm after moving to North Fork. Townspeople befriend Jake's pretty daughter, Abbey, who is deaf and cannot speak. Problems arise when a trail bum attacks her and blames the hired hand. Lucas must find the truth.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E18 Sporting Chance Englishman Jeremy Pennebroke arrives in North Fork and announces he has come to kill Lucas McCain with his custom-made rifle. He believes if he guns Lucas down, he will earn respect and a reputation. Ironically, Lucas later defends Pennebroke.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E6 Town of Fear Cheyenne delivers a bank robber to his friend Sheriff Sam Townley. Soon afterward, the townspeople accuse Townley of accidentally shooting a popular farmer's son and they turn against Cheyenne when he tries to prove the sheriff's innocence.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E7 Hired Gun Cheyenne rides into a new town looking for work. He meets a hired gunman named Preacher in a saloon. When the town sheriff shoots and kills Preacher, Cheyenne investigates to find out why he was there in the first place.

programme.desc: S4 E15 The Princess Lucas and Mark find a young woman named Jennifer and her ill brother, Charles, hiding in their barn. Doc Burrage treats the boy for measles and they take refuge at the McCain Ranch, but soon Lucas learns that she may be a runaway princess from Europe.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E16 Gunfire Infamous outlaw Charlie Gordo is in the North Fork Jail waiting for the U.S. Marshal to take him to Yuma for hanging. Micah learns that the lawman is dead, and Gordo's gang is arriving soon. Micah, Lucas, and others defend the jail from the gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E17 The Quiet Fear Jake Striker buys Brice Hornsby's farm after moving to North Fork. Townspeople befriend Jake's pretty daughter, Abbey, who is deaf and cannot speak. Problems arise when a trail bum attacks her and blames the hired hand. Lucas must find the truth.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E18 Sporting Chance Englishman Jeremy Pennebroke arrives in North Fork and announces he has come to kill Lucas McCain with his custom-made rifle. He believes if he guns Lucas down, he will earn respect and a reputation. Ironically, Lucas later defends Pennebroke.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E6 Town of Fear Cheyenne delivers a bank robber to his friend Sheriff Sam Townley. Soon afterward, the townspeople accuse Townley of accidentally shooting a popular farmer's son and they turn against Cheyenne when he tries to prove the sheriff's innocence.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E7 Hired Gun Cheyenne rides into a new town looking for work. He meets a hired gunman named Preacher in a saloon. When the town sheriff shoots and kills Preacher, Cheyenne investigates to find out why he was there in the first place.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E15 Daisy Rachel's hustler ex-boyfriend, Roger, comes back to Sweetwater with his daughter, Daisy. Daisy's mischief results in a fight between The Kid and Jimmy. Meanwhile, Lou and The Kid break up because she is not ready for marriage.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E17 Old Scores Convinced that he has seen one of the men responsible for the murder of his family, Ike seeks revenge. However, the suspect is now a family man himself. Meanwhile, the riders investigate reports of a mysterious beast in the area.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E23 The Second Witness Lucas' life is in danger after he agrees to testify in a murder case in another town. The only other witness was killed, and when a gun-toting stranger appears at the McCain Ranch, Lucas now finds himself in grave danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E24 The Trade Outlaw Sam Morley, an old friend, comes to the McCain Ranch. He asks Lucas to turn in him for the $500 reward and use the money to pay for his girlfriend's medical care. However, a bounty hunter has other ideas.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E8 The Gold Rush Lawman When failed prospector John Hicks Adams is elected sheriff of Santa Clara County, he must prove that he won't be a bust as a lawman too. Just weeks into the job, his courage is tested when a band of stagecoach robbers begins terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E3 Pinkerton Detectives Track a Killer After a bank robbery, two Pinkerton detectives join forces to track the notorious Missouri Kid. During a shootout, the Missouri Kid kills seasoned detective Charles Schumacher, leaving young George Dougherty to finish the job and avenge his death.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E1 Joe Meek: A Fearless Fighter Already a seasoned mountain man, Joe Meek has a reputation for raw courage and bravery among the trappers of the west. But Meek becomes a frontier legend when he risks his life in a fearless charge to save the woman that he loves from Crow warriors.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E7 Bandits When a masked bandit terrorizes the stagecoach line, killing a passenger, Theodore Roosevelt and his Elkhorn men join the citizens of Medora to track down the culprit. Can they lay a trap to catch the killer before he strikes again?

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E19 A Young Man's Fancy A pretty young girl named Sally Walker arrives on stagecoach in North Fork to visit her aunt Milly. When Mark sees her beauty, he falls in love with Sally instantly. However, she has her eyes on a boy from her past, Bruce Henry, who owns a ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E20 The Man from Salinas Lucas is acting deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. When the North Fork Bank is robbed, Lucas shoots and critically wounds Rudy Gray. Problems arise when a man posing as Gray's brother arrives in town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E21 Two Ounces of Tin A gunman named Tip Corey, whose father was allegedly murdered in North Fork, rides into town and threatens to kill Marshal Micah Torrance. Corey gives Micah an ultimatum: take his badge off or he will end his life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E22 Deadly Image A local rancher, who claims to be an eyewitness, accuses Lucas of murder. Townspeople are shocked until Earl Bantry, who looks like Lucas' twin, arrives in North Fork. Bantry, a ruthless criminal, threatens Mark and goes on a rampage against Lucas.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E8 Top Hand Cheyenne turns down a job as top hand for a local rancher. Other ranchers who want his service soon confront him. Cheyenne discovers that he is now in the middle of a range war, which includes land and water rights.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Last Comanchero Cheyenne tracks down and captures the leader of the last Comancheros, Rafe Larkin. Once back in town, he soon discovers that the townspeople demand Rafe's lynching since he sold weapons to the Indians.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E15 Daisy Rachel's hustler ex-boyfriend, Roger, comes back to Sweetwater with his daughter, Daisy. Daisy's mischief results in a fight between The Kid and Jimmy. Meanwhile, Lou and The Kid break up because she is not ready for marriage.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E17 Old Scores Convinced that he has seen one of the men responsible for the murder of his family, Ike seeks revenge. However, the suspect is now a family man himself. Meanwhile, the riders investigate reports of a mysterious beast in the area.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E22 Deadly Image A local rancher, who claims to be an eyewitness, accuses Lucas of murder. Townspeople are shocked until Earl Bantry, who looks like Lucas' twin, arrives in North Fork. Bantry, a ruthless criminal, threatens Mark and goes on a rampage against Lucas.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E8 Top Hand Cheyenne turns down a job as top hand for a local rancher. Other ranchers who want his service soon confront him. Cheyenne discovers that he is now in the middle of a range war, which includes land and water rights.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Last Comanchero Cheyenne tracks down and captures the leader of the last Comancheros, Rafe Larkin. Once back in town, he soon discovers that the townspeople demand Rafe's lynching since he sold weapons to the Indians.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Talisman After a priest contacts Teaspoon for help, he takes the riders on a mission to save a village of farmers being terrorized by ruthless bandits who want their silver. Meanwhile, Buck helps protect a woman from a man that has an infatuation with her.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Noble Chase Jimmy teams up with his rival, Jake Colter, to hunt down Lon Chase, a bank robber with a heart of gold that has a high price on his head. Chase ultimately convinces them that he had to do it in order to stop illegal activity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E8 The Many Faces of Charles Siringo Unable to apprehend the train-robbing Smith Brothers, Sheriff Doc Shores calls the Pinkerton Detective Agency for assistance. The agency sends Charles Siringo, an undercover specialist known for his unorthodox methods of capturing criminals.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E3 Bass Reeves Tracks Belle Starr As U.S. Marshal Bass Reeves attempts to arrest Belle Starr and her outlaw husband, Belle asks for 24 hours to find someone to care for her young daughter, Pearl. When the Starr family decides to flee instead, the Marshal must track them down.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E2 Jim Beckwourth: The Long Ride Jim Beckwourth lives a life of adventure as a trapper, trader and adopted member of the Crow tribe. When America goes to war, Beckwourth becomes an army dispatch rider, a job that puts him and a young greenhorn on a collision course with the Pawnee.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E6 Ten-Cent Hero A dime novelist takes revenge on Jimmy by creating a story in his latest novel, penning him as Wild Bill Hickok, "the fastest gun in the West." Soon afterward, a hired gunman arrives in Sweetwater to take him down in a gunfight.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E8 Crossroads After a wildfire rages through Elkhorn Ranch, Theodore Roosevelt is forced to sell some livestock before the fall roundup. But Roosevelt's pride prevents him from accepting a low offer from the town's founder, triggering a violent chain of events.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E23 The Debt While Marshal Micah Torrance is transporting a prisoner to his execution, he meets Lucas and Mark on the trail. When Mark reocognizes the convict is the same man who saved his life three years earlier, he disobeys his father and helps him escape.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E24 Tinhorn Mark and Milly are shocked that Lucas has taken up gambling. However, they don't know that a good friend is in danger of losing his farm to a professional gambler and has asked Lucas to help. Lucas goes undercover to get to the bottom of things.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E25 None So Blind Mark befriends Lafayette Blye, a blind banjo-playing man. Blye tells Mark he's hunting the man responsible for his blindness. Meanwhile, veterinarian John J. Mack tells Lucas he needs to destroy his herd. It turns out Mack is the man Blye is seeking.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E26 Jealous Man Micah's friends, Jake Owens, and his pretty wife, Fay, are Lucas' new neighbors. Jake is wildly jealous of Fay and wrongly imagines Lucas and Fay are having a romance. Jake soon threatens to kill Lucas, which almost leads to his own death instead.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Gamble Cheyenne helps an old friend by helping her keep her saloon from crooked gamblers. The woman's daughter who has been back east in school, will be arriving back in town soon, but she knows nothing about how her mother earned money for her education.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E11 Renegades Cheyenne fulfills a dying war hero's wish and helps his son enlist in the Army. Cheyenne arrives at Fort Sumner with Jed Wayne, but trouble soon arises from a demanding colonel and the Comanche Indians' imminent uprising.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Talisman After a priest contacts Teaspoon for help, he takes the riders on a mission to save a village of farmers being terrorized by ruthless bandits who want their silver. Meanwhile, Buck helps protect a woman from a man that has an infatuation with her.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E11 Renegades Cheyenne fulfills a dying war hero's wish and helps his son enlist in the Army. Cheyenne arrives at Fort Sumner with Jed Wayne, but trouble soon arises from a demanding colonel and the Comanche Indians' imminent uprising.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E20 Face of the Enemy Teaspoon's old friend, war hero Colonel Matthew Curtis, orders an attack on the Sioux delegation after they ambush his men. The townspeople are in danger when the Sioux threatens to retaliate. It turns out that another tribe is responsible.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E1 A House Divided After the destruction of a Pony Express station in Rock Creek, Teaspoon, The Kid, and Jimmy receive an assignment to rebuild it. They must relocate and learn the new territory near town as well as the neighbors in the area.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E27 The Wrong Man A crooked marshal comes to North Fork looking for a wanted man. He finds a man fitting the futitive's description. He deliberately kills the wrong man to collect the bounty and then blackmails the real outlaw, who wants to keep his past hidden.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E28 The Challenge An escaped killer wants to prove he hasn't lost his nerve when he holds up North Fork's General Store and takes Marshal Micah Torrance hostage. He provokes the town to try to face him, but only Lucas is strong enough to rise up to his challenge.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E2 Billy the Kid: Birth of an Outlaw Teenaged fugitive William Bonney is given a second chance when a kindhearted ranch owner offers him a job. But when his new employer is killed in cold blood, Bonney reverts to his criminal ways, seeking vengeance and transforming into Billy the Kid.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Discoveries of George McJunkin After a devastating storm, ranch foreman George McJunkin finds ancient bison fossils and flint points unearthed in a riverbank, and he sets out to find someone in the scientific community who will acknowledge the importance of his discovery.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E3 Jim Baker: A Born Leader Heading west as a young adventurer, greenhorn Jim Baker quickly develops a reputation as a skilled marksman and mountain man. When a party of trappers is surrounded and attacked by Cheyenne and Arapaho warriors, Baker proves that he is also a leader.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Roundup Theodore Roosevelt and his Elkhorn men strike out for the open range to participate in their first cattle roundup. But their excitement about gathering their herd is soon overshadowed by the realization that others are conspiring against them.
